phrases.phrase: 당신에 대한 나의 마음은 결코 변하지 않을 것입니다.
meanings: 이성교제 How I feel about you will never change.

phrases.phrase: 둘이서 보낸 즐거웠던 시간을 결코 잊지 않을 거야.
meanings: 이성교제 I'll never forget the wonderful time we had together.

vlive.korean: [결코 지치지 않는 뱀뱀] 얼굴만 딴대요~ 그리고 끝! [BamBam doesn't lose] They're just getting our faces! Then we're done! 듣기 View video GOT7 : GOT7(갓세븐) HOTLINE #14
vlive.english: [BamBam doesn't lose] They're just getting our faces! Then we're done!

vlive.korean: 저는 결코 피하지 않을 거예요. I'm not going to back down. 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 5분만에 너한테 반했어♥ㅣ짝녀한테 심쿵할 때ㅣ[리얼하이로맨스(Real High School Romance)] EP 2
vlive.english: I'm not going to back down.

vlive.korean: [결코 호락호락하지 않은 요리의 길!] [Cooking isn't as easy as it seems!] View video 소녀포레스트 - SM CCC LAB : [소녀포레스트ㅣGIRLS FOR REST] EP44. 다음주의 소포
vlive.english: [Cooking isn't as easy as it seems!]

vlive.korean: 결코 방심하지 마라 - 이야~ 빵도 있네? Don't be inattentive... - Wow, you have bread too? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : [연애포차 시즌1] - EP.07 냉장고 채워주는 남사친? 남친?
vlive.english: Don't be inattentive... - Wow, you have bread too?

vlive.korean: [결코 혼자 죽는 않는 엄지] [네?!] 산하 씨 뭐라고요? [ I won't die alone] [What?] Sanha what? 듣기 View video GFRIEND : SBS MTV <요고바라 10화> 동시생중계
vlive.english: [ I won't die alone] [What?] Sanha what?

examples.korean: The inquiry is by no means cut and dried. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 조사는 결코 확정적인 것이 아니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The inquiry is by no means cut and dried. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He never flinched from facing up to trouble. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 결코 수고를 피하려 하지 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He never flinched from facing up to trouble. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He never deviated from his original plan. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 원래 계획에서 결코 벗어나지 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He never deviated from his original plan. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She vowed never to speak to him again. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 결코 다시는 그에게 말을 하지 않겠다고 맹세했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She vowed never to speak to him again. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: the stultifying effects of work that never varies 듣기 Add to Wordbook 결코 변화가 없는 일의, 사람을 멍청하게 만드는 효과 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the stultifying effects of work that never varies Add to Wordbook
